summary: Filmmaker John Huston narrates this Oscar-nominated World War II-era film about life among the U.S. soldiers protecting Alaska's Aleutian Islands.
cast: John Huston|Walter Huston|Milton Ashkin|Lyle A. Bean|Jack Chennault|C.M. McCorkle|Hawley P. Nill|William Prince|George I. Radell|Henry J. Strenkowski
title: Report from the Aleutians
